website_summaries.verdict: Gives you a classic industrial dining table design of wood and metal.
pros: Steel legs can support a lot of weight on top of the good-looking pine wood table top
Good size at about 52.5 inches by 34 inches
Steel legs have cross beams that enhance the unit's industrial feel
cons: Position of legs makes it impossible to sit at the ends of the table comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This table was exactly what we wanted for our new condo. It's big enough to seat 4 people, but takes up minimal space in our smaller condo. The assembly was a breeze (a matter of inserting 8 bolts to fasten the legs then tightening a few others on the table to lock everything into place), and the packing for this table was really great. It's well protected by Styrofoam, but each piece of foam is individually wrapped in plastic so that it doesn't make a Styrofoam mess all over the house, which was great. It gives the place a nice industrial-modern look, and we will finally be able to host small dinner parties again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy wooden table. Arrived without any dings, scratches, dents, etc. Pieces all lined up. Based on the other reviews, I was worried this would be a real gamble, but it turned out just great. Seems like it's still risky to order, but I'm glad I did. It's the perfect height for my office desk and looks really great in our living room. Overall very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sushibear

customer_reviews.title: A wobbly table and cheaply made see pictures
customer_reviews.text: This table came damaged it's not put together right had to take off a lot of the glue on top of the table it wobbles and all the screws fit perfectly except one I had a force it in.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa vargas

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but might be a little fragile.
customer_reviews.text: The main panel is a little too thin, just enough to not inspire confidence in longevity. But the trim is thick and solid, as too is the frame. When I do drop something on it and it breaks...itll be easy to enlay a thicker replacement. Overall, it's very much worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Both have been great, high quality purchases
customer_reviews.text: I got this table to match my recently purchased Zinus industrial coffee table. Both have been great, high quality purchases. This is a good buy if you're looking for a dining table to fit a small family of 4. Assembly only took a couple minutes and 4 screws. attached a picture of the underside of the table during the short assembly time :) Product is sturdy and the wood table top is made of actual quality wood, not some composite materials that you might find with other furniture vendors.
customer_reviews.author: C Y

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Decent little table, pretty sturdy, not overly large, great for 2 people to find comfortably in a small area
customer_reviews.author: Jason D

customer_reviews.title: Simple Yet Handsome Industrial Design Dining Table
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the size, quality and look of this table. Although it’s technically a dining table, it is being used as a desk, perfect size for our use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Newman

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and defective
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived with damage on top and one corner. One of the leg screw holes would not line up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle O

customer_reviews.title: Table top is unique, but uneven. Mousepad fixes it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and am using it as a desk for my home office. Needed something sturdy and big enough to hold my Tv that I use as a second screen. Dog bed so my old Tess can hang out while I work.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: but easy to set up and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these. Not as long as I expected, but easy to set up and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Table using as a desk. Works great. Packed very good in box no scratches. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Zinus Alicia Industrial Style Dining Table
product_meta.description: Bring contemporary flair to your dining room with the industrial style dining table by Zinus. Featuring aesthetically treated pine wood and steel legs, this durable table will stand the test of time. This sturdy dining table seats four comfortably, assembles easily in minutes, and comes with a worry-free 1-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Treated pine wood with durable Steel legs
Table only; does not include chairs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars24 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
